--- title: "Causal modeling" date: "2025-04-15" --- ## Before class - Elemental confounds (1 h 05 min) ```{=html}
``` ## During class To save these slides as a PDF on your computer, open the menu (three horizontal bars in the bottom left of the slides), then Tools (gear symbol in the top), and PDF export (or ``e''). You can then right-click on the slides, select Print, and save as PDF. :::{.callout-tip} **Fun fact**: If you type ? (or shift + /) while going through the slides, you can see a list of special slide-specific commands. :::
